profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I am a frontend developer with a strong foundation in software testing, which has honed my attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality applications. My expertise lies in building dynamic, user-friendly interfaces with React, focusing on functionality, performance, and seamless user experiences. I approach challenges with curiosity and a practical mindset, collaborating effectively with teams to develop solutions that improve both user satisfaction and application performance.

projects.name: Clover Laundry
description: Developed a clean and user-friendly front-end interface using React and Material UI, tailored to the needs of a laundry business.
Enhanced code reliability and maintainability by leveraging TypeScript for static typing and improved debugging.
Designed a fully responsive layout, ensuring seamless usability across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Collaborated with the client to understand requirements and deliver a polished, functional web application.
Resolved client-reported technical issues using the Linux terminal, SSH, and database queries.
Performed functional, regression, and database testing for retail systems.
Created test cases, prepared test reports, and communicated software releases to clients.
Trained and mentored new testers to ensure efficient onboarding and performance.

info.company: CES (Centro de Ensayos de Software) - Internship
